factory_type.name: Brickyard
factory_type.info: With bricks to us opens a big world of possibilities

factory_type.name: Quarry
factory_type.info: The terrain on this planet have lot of clay in it, it can help with further advancement. Do not worry - work in a quarry

factory_type.name: Industrial miller
factory_type.info: This building have enough power to grind hard materials

factory_type.name: Moss farm
factory_type.info: The air is full of moss spores, it seems that in that moss is high percentage of oxygen. We can get profit out of it

factory_type.name: Core mine
factory_type.info: The core of the planet has materials that can withstand the temperature to melt metal, and highly oxygenised moss will help us

factory_type.name: Forge
factory_type.info: With newly acquired metal we get endless possibilities

factory_type.name: Plastics factory
factory_type.info: With oily substances we can produce plastics - the stapel of advanced civilization

factory_type.name: Roboport
factory_type.info: With roboports we can enlarge our territory of influence to expand our empire

factory_type.name: Escape pod
factory_type.info: We saved ourselves, but we cut down from our commandment. We need to stand strong to survive and get out of here. They are waiting. How you even get there, you dataminer!

factory_type.name: Sand research facility
factory_type.info: We spotted a biological presence in sand, we need to research it to get more information

factory_type.name: Radar
factory_type.info: We can't go blind, we need to know what is coming

factory_type.name: Corall farm
factory_type.info: These corals may be useful for our further industrialization, need further research

factory_type.name: Subsurface water pump
factory_type.info: Surface of this planet has a lot of moisture in it, we can use it to our advantage

factory_type.name: Corall press
factory_type.info: The corall block is proven to be very useful, to our surprise, in some contraptions

factory_type.name: Moss press
factory_type.info: If pressed corall is useful, why not try it with moss?

factory_type.name: Combiner
factory_type.info: The most powerful material, the stone-iron, marks the end of our struggles

factory_type.name: Power washer
factory_type.info: Sometimes we need more sand, and we have just the thing for it

factory_type.name: rocket_silo
factory_type.info: We need to get out of here, and we need to do it fast. They ARE waiting, but not for long

factory_type.name: Observatory
factory_type.info: If we want to get out of here, we need to know how

factory_type.name: brick_compressor
factory_type.info: All-known strategy to get more out of any material. More durable - more everything

factory_type.name: Advanced brickyard
factory_type.info: We need to improve our old, primitive technologies

factory_type.name: Advanced quarry
factory_type.info: Mining is never gets old

factory_type.name: Gear miller
factory_type.info: With reductors we can get unthinkable power

factory_type.name: Watring moss farm
factory_type.info: Expected water shenanigans, always tops biological production

factory_type.name: Enhanced core mine
factory_type.info: Little improvement here, little improvement there, and we get what we need

factory_type.name: Hellforge
factory_type.info: With whis kind of power we can forge anything

factory_type.name: Plastics megafactory
factory_type.info: There is never enough plastics

factory_type.name: Big roboport
factory_type.info: Big roboport for big territory control

factory_type.name: The Hub
factory_type.info: The Hub is multi-purpose building for expanding our ever growing empire

factory_type.name: Epic research facility
factory_type.info: All the data we'll ever need

factory_type.name: Quadradar
factory_type.info: The ultimate solution to our blindness

factory_type.name: Suface scanner
factory_type.info: We think that the surface is more than it seems

factory_type.name: the_ultimate_misshap
factory_type.info: Error, try again... We sailed through the space to find new planet for our dying civilization. Long time has passed, we don't know are there still our kind. We still recive signals from our homeworld, but there are only incoherent messages from the past,.. we think.

factory_type.name: Circuit factory
factory_type.info: Another great invention, the basic circuit. Why only now?! So many years... It even may be irrelevant now

factory_type.name: no_compact_drill
factory_type.info: This planet not so bad, as it seems. Maybe this is we was looking for?

factory_type.name: Mega subsurface pump
factory_type.info: We need more water, they were true - water is life

factory_type.name: Cosmic forge
factory_type.info: Maybe this amount of power will be enough to get us out of here

factory_type.name: Electromagnetic oil pump
factory_type.info: Deep below the planet surface long ago there were lushy moss caves, now they are oil. And we need it

factory_type.name: Bio oil press
factory_type.info: Squeez the moss, squeeze the corall, although it is bio, it is still oil
